alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Charleston; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:32PM EDT until June 17 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Charleston County in southeastern South Carolina... Berkeley County in southeastern South Carolina... Dorchester County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 932 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Magnolia Gardens, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: North Charleston, Mount Pleasant, Summerville, Goose Creek, Hanahan, Downtown Charleston, West Ashley, Daniel Island, Fort Sumter, Naval Weapons Station Charleston, I-26/I-526 Interchange, Ladson, Johns Island, Isle Of Palms and Folly Beach. This warning includes the following interstates: I-26 between mile markers 204 and 221. I-526 between mile markers 11 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
